metadata.title: CVE-2019-10013 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The asn1_signature function in asn1.c in Cameron Hamilton-Rich axTLS through 2.1.5 has a Buffer Overflow that allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory and CPU consumption) via a crafted certificate in the TLS certificate handshake message, because the result of get_asn1_length() is not checked for a minimum or maximum size.

criterions.comment: axtls package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
